DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.
When the card costs more than the energy you currently have, it becomes free but playing it Exhausts a card in your hand.
Loaded cards will be drawn from the top of your draw pile if your hand isn't full, otherwise they will be Overdrawn.
Overdrawn cards will be discarded, then a copy of that card will be added to your draw pile.
